p: Future climate variables were downloaded from WorldClim [ 31], the Consultative Group on International Agricultural Research (CGIAR), and the research program on Climate Change, Agriculture and Food Security (CCAFS). To reduce uncertainty regarding future climate conditions ( S1 Fig), rather than using the 13 original global climate models (GCMs, S3 Table) from the IPCC 5th Assessment, the PCA (median) protocol was also used to generate consensus “climate models” among the 13 GCMs for each climate dimensions for 2050–2060 and 2080–2090 ( S4 Table).
